articles.author: Liam Headd
articles.title: Rain arrives at Longchamp as bookies say Alpinista would be 'worst result' - Racing Post
articles.description: The Qatar Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe, Europe's richest Flat race, is set to be run on ground described as soft, good to soft in places at Longchamp on Sunday.
articles.content:
By Liam Headd 
 UPDATED 1:50PM, OCT 2 2022
Rain arrived but swiftly passed prior to the start of one of the most anticipated days of the entire Flat season at Longchamp, a card headlined by the Qat… [+4048 chars]
